name: DisarmIt
description:
You just stated working at the bomb disarmament facility, where there is no shortage of bombs or jobs. At your station you have the tools you need to disarm the bombs. As the new guy, you get the bombs which are close to detonation, they roll in on a conveyer belt pass your station, where you have to disarm them before the timer runs out and the bomb blows you up.

---

LD51, first game jam, first attempt at pixel art, which took way longer than anticipated. Great fun, 10/10 will participate again.

Project is working, but lacks audio amongst other things. The idea was to have more different kinds of bombs, animations and audio, however rl time constraints is a cruel mistress :) 

All feedback appreciated :)

//FreeRunner || EctoCat
